name: Black Resin Pong
description:
NOTICE: Black Resin and all of it's characters do NOT belong to me. They are the property of the actual devs of Black Resin. Here's the actual game page(Go give it a play!)  : https://pies-dariusz.itch.io/black-resin I was given permission to publish this.

Player one controls: W and S
Player two controls: UP and DOWN arrow keys
